blocks.heading: Built Specifically for Split-Fee Recruiting
blocks.subtitle: Every feature is designed to remove friction, increase transparency, and maximize your earning potential.

items.title: Live Role Marketplace
items.description: Browse verified split-fee roles from vetted hiring companies. Filter by industry, compensation range, and fee structure.

items.title: Transparent Fee Splits
items.description: Know your split before submitting candidates. No hidden terms, no unclear agreements.

items.title: Direct Hiring Access
items.description: Communicate directly with hiring companies. Eliminate layers and move faster.

items.title: AI-Powered Matching
items.description: Our AI analyzes role requirements and recruiter specialties to suggest high-fit opportunities.

items.title: Integrated Messaging
items.description: Keep all conversations organized in-platform with searchable, secure messaging.

items.title: Performance Analytics
items.description: Track submissions, interviews, placements, and revenue in one unified dashboard.

blocks.heading: Access High-Quality Roles Instantly
paragraphs: Stop relying on fragmented job boards and private email chains. Splits Network centralizes premium split-fee roles in one marketplace.
Filter by specialty, compensation band, and fee structure to focus only on roles that align with your expertise.

items.title: Advanced Filters
items.body: Refine by location, industry, compensation, and split percentage.

items.title: Instant Alerts
items.body: Receive notifications when new roles match your profile.

blocks.heading: Understand and Optimize Your Pipeline
paragraphs: Data drives better placements. See which industries convert fastest, which roles yield the highest fees, and where your pipeline needs attention.
Make informed decisions backed by real performance insights.

items.title: Revenue Tracking
items.body: Monitor total fees earned and projected payouts.

items.title: Submission Insights
items.body: Track candidate progress from submission to placement.

items.question: Is it free to join?
items.answer: Yes. Recruiters can join for free and browse available roles. Advanced features may require an upgraded plan.

items.question: How are split fees determined?
items.answer: Hiring companies define the split percentage when posting a role. The terms are visible before submission.

items.question: Do I communicate directly with companies?
items.answer: Yes. Splits Network enables direct communication to reduce delays and improve placement speed.
